text: Completely unnoticed @MikeBloomberg⁩ just created the biggest loophole in campaign finance law - financed/donated millions to his own campaign, dropped out and then donated $18 million of his own money to DNC, well in excess normal personal limitations  https://t.co/uKmbpsLnIT

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical

domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain
